summary: I BOUGHT A 2003 F-250 6.0 DIESEL. THIS IS A NEW ENGINE THIS YEAR, I OHAVE HAD THE TRUCK ONLY 5 DAYS BEFORE THE MOTOR STARTS SHAKING A 50 MPH AND WHILE IM AT A STOP LIGHT IT SHAKES VERY BAD W/ NO CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ON, AND I TOOK IT TO THE DEALER AND ITS BEEN THERE LONGER THEN IVE OWNED THE TRUCK FOR.. I ALSO PRESSED THE GAS PEDAL WHEN I NOTICED THE TRUCK DID NOT MOVE, AND 1 SEC AFTER I LET GO OF THE GAS PEDAL THE TRUCK TOOK OFF BY ITS SELF... WHATS GOING ON W? THIS TRUCK???THIS TRUCK SHOULD BE STOPPED FROM BEING SOLD AND CAUSING THE OWNERS W/ HEART ACHES..
